page.title: 15ACCOMMODATION
page.content: Sanday caters well for visitors. There are: a licensed hotel, a guest house, bed and breakfast and self-catering cottages all of which are reasonably priced. Campers are also welcome and most farmers will be pleased to let you camp on their land if you first ask their permission. The accommodation for tourists is as follows:_ {HOTEL-}Kettletoft; 1 double, 1 twin and 3 single rooms, Residents Lounge, Public and Lounge Bar; Caravans. {GUEST HOUSE-}Belsair; 3 rooms, bed & breakfast and full board; licensed. {BED & BREAKFAST-}A) Kettletoft; 2 double & 1 single rooms, full or part board, packed lunches, evening meals. B) Elsness;1 double room, evening meal. {SELF CATERING COTTAGES-}Bankhouse; sleeps 6.
